Class PolynomCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.berlin.student.polynom.controller.PolynomCalculator

  • public class PolynomCalculator
extends Object
    Class that does the calculation for a given polynom.
    Author:
    Matthias Drummer

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public BigDecimal evaluate(Polynom polynom,
                  BigDecimal x)
        Evaluates the polynom via the horner schema.
        Parameters:
        polynom - the Polynom to evaluate
        x - the value for x used for the evaluation
        Returns:
        the value for the evaluated polynom
        See Also:
        http://rosettacode.org/wiki/Horner's_rule_for_polynomial_evaluation#Java

      • multiply

        public Polynom multiply(Polynom poly1,
               Polynom poly2)
        Multiplies two given polynoms.
        Parameters:
        poly1 - the first polynom
        poly2 - the second polynom
        Returns:
        the result
        See Also:
        http://sol.cs.hm.edu/dpunkt-java-praktikum/polynomial/Polynomial.java

        Parameters:
        poly1 - the first polynom
        poly2 - the second polynom to substract from the first one
        Returns:
        the result

        Do the first derivate of a polynom.

        Returns:
